
# Cryptography - rsa-pop-quiz (200 points)

## Challenge

*Class, take your seats! It's PRIME-time for a quiz... nc 2019shell1.picoctf.com 49989.*

## Flag



## Walkthrough

After a connection to `2019shell1.picoctf.com:49989`, we have to answer several questions about RSA algorithm.

### Problem 1
```bash
#### NEW PROBLEM ####
q : 60413
p : 76753
##### PRODUCE THE FOLLOWING ####
n
IS THIS POSSIBLE and FEASIBLE? (Y/N):
#### TIME TO SHOW ME WHAT YOU GOT! ###
n: 4636878989
Outstanding move!!!
```

`n = q * p`, so yes it is possible and feasible.

### Problem 2
```bash
#### NEW PROBLEM ####
p : 54269
n : 5051846941
##### PRODUCE THE FOLLOWING ####
q
IS THIS POSSIBLE and FEASIBLE? (Y/N):Y
#### TIME TO SHOW ME WHAT YOU GOT! ###
q: 93089
Outstanding move!!!
```

`q = n / p`, so yes it is possible and feasible.

### Problem 3
```bash
#### NEW PROBLEM ####
e : 3
n : 
##### PRODUCE THE FOLLOWING ####
q
p
IS THIS POSSIBLE and FEASIBLE? (Y/N):N
Outstanding move!!!
```

The fact that we cannot do this is literally the reason RSA works, bacause of the complexity of the prime factorisation of N.

### Problem 4
```bash
#### NEW PROBLEM ####
q : 66347
p : 12611
##### PRODUCE THE FOLLOWING ####
totient(n)
IS THIS POSSIBLE and FEASIBLE? (Y/N):Y
#### TIME TO SHOW ME WHAT YOU GOT! ###
totient(n): 836623060
Outstanding move!!!
```

`r = totient(n) = (p - 1) * (q - 1)`, so yes it is possible and feasible.

### Problem 5
```bash
#### NEW PROBLEM ####
plaintext : 6357294171489311547190987615544575133581967886499484091352661406414044440475205342882841236357665973431462491355089413710392273380203038793241564304774271529108729717
e : 3
n : 
##### PRODUCE THE FOLLOWING ####
ciphertext
IS THIS POSSIBLE and FEASIBLE? (Y/N): Y
```
